title: Cyclist Magazine Podcast Episode 33 – Phil Liggett, the voice of cycling
content:
Cyclist magazine
24 Jun 2021

James and Joe sit down with legendary commentator Phil Liggett ahead of the 2021 Tour de France

With the Tour de France starting this weekend, who better to sit down with than the voice of cycling himself, Phil Liggett? Liggett has offered a soundtrack to cycling for almost 50 years, describing the sport of cycling to millions around the world from the commentary booth.

In the latest edition of the Cyclist Magazine Podcast, James and Joe chat to Phil about how he got into cycling commentary, his iconic partnership with the late Paul Sherwen, life after Paul and what makes the Tour de France such a special race.
